formElement.name: SeqNumber
formElement.label: Sequence Number
formElement.helpText: Enter the sequence number or a comma separated list

validationRule.errorMessage: Not a valid ID. It should be a positive integer or a comma separated list of positive integers

param.name: clientScript
param.value: if(!IsValidPositiveInteger(arguments.Value)) { var values = arguments.Value.split(','); if(values.length > 0) { for(j = 0; j < values.length; j++) { if(!IsValidPositiveInteger(values[j])) { arguments.IsValid = false; break; } else arguments.IsValid = true; } } else arguments.IsValid = false; } else { arguments.IsValid = true; }

fieldConfig.dropDownItemsSelect: SELECT S.SEQUENCEID AS KEY, S.PREFIX AS VALUE FROM REGDB.VW_SEQUENCE S WHERE (TYPE = 'R' OR TYPE = 'A') ORDER BY S.PREFIX ASC
SELECT PROJECTID as key, NAME as value FROM REGDB.VW_PROJECT WHERE (TYPE ='R' OR TYPE='A') AND (ACTIVE = 'T' OR ACTIVE = 'F')
SELECT ID as key, NAME as value FROM REGDB.VW_IDENTIFIERTYPE WHERE (TYPE ='R' OR TYPE='A') AND ACTIVE = 'T'

validationRule.errorMessage: You must specify at least one field. The drawing should be a chemical structure.

fieldConfig.dropDownItemsSelect: SELECT ID as key, NAME as value FROM REGDB.VW_IDENTIFIERTYPE WHERE (TYPE ='C' OR TYPE='A') AND ACTIVE = 'T'

validationRule.errorMessage: Not a valid ID. It should be a positive integer

fieldConfig.dropDownItemsSelect: SELECT PROJECTID as key, NAME as value FROM REGDB.VW_PROJECT WHERE (TYPE ='B' OR TYPE='A') AND (ACTIVE = 'T' OR ACTIVE = 'F')

validationRule.errorMessage: This property can have at most 3 integer and 2 decimal digits

COE:table.name: Table_1
COE:table.COE:headerStyle: color: #000099; background-color: #CFD8E6; font-weight: bold; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 10px;border-collapse:collapse;
COE:table.COE:columnStyle: color: #000000; background-color: #FFFFFF; border-color: #CFD8E6; border-style:solid; border-width:1px; font-size:10px;font-family: Verdana;vertical-align:middle;text-align:center;

COE:table.name: Table_9
COE:table.COE:headerStyle: color: #000099; background-color: #CFD8E6; font-weight: bold; font-family: Verdana; font-size: 10px;border-collapse:collapse;
COE:table.COE:columnStyle: color: #000000; background-color: #FFFFFF; border-color: #CFD8E6; border-style:solid; border-width:1px; font-size:10px;font-family: Verdana;vertical-align:middle;text-align:center;
